Summary: Me and 2 of my friends thought it was a helicopter at first cause it was shinning a search light on the ground but all the sudden it shot above us so fast we knew it was something we never seen before
divs: Sighting DetailsIn the summer of 2000 me and two friends were in the woods about a mile from our neighborhood we had built a club house and were working on it, it was in the biggest tree with the most branches we could find and really high off the ground i was inside and my friend rooney was on the roof when he told me and my other friend that was on the ground that he sees three helicoptors hovering over the swamp the clubhouse or treehouse whatever you wanna call it was on the edge of where the swamp began so we both climed on the roof with him and we thought it was helicoptors also because it was shinning a search light on the swamp when all of a sudden one of the crafts did about a 15 mile circle in about a second and started flying in a pattern above us going back and forth and up and down and didnt make any noise it was so crazy i couldnt even talk i would swear in court we seen it and all the sudden it just shot off into space i dont know what happened to the other crafts cause after that one was gone we didnt see the other two we was paying to much attendtion to the one ever since then i spent a bonch of ours trying to spot it again this time on camera so i could have proof but i never seen it again i never believed in ufos before that but now i do and anyone who sees what we seen would believe in them to the government has to know about what they really are, some people we tell about it they try to tell us it was just a secret goernment craft but if that true what the hell are they doing still using rockets if they have such crafts i really think it was from another world and if makes me sick that the government would keep such a thing from us they are like little children with a secret and if they ell us it wont be a secret no more they need to grow up and tell us the truth about our brothers from the stars
